Text: 150 MB space needed to download updates after the game is installed. Feel free to comment if the game does or does not work on ur Android device... ENJOY!

And for those who think that the game is stuck on the "EA" screen, it isn't. You will hear the music in the background playing. It takes approx. 2 minutes for the EA screen to disappear and then the game will start...
